Nat.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
gcd.div_by_p_lt : forall p n : nat, 2 <= p -> n <> 0 -> gcd.div n p < n
msum_of_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = u) -> msum m u n f = u
Nat.lt_le_incl : forall n m : nat, n < m -> n <= m
Nat.lt_le_pred : forall n m : nat, n < m -> n <= Nat.pred m
le_lt_n_Sm : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> n < S m
lt_le_S : forall n m : nat, n < m -> S n <= m
le_not_lt : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> ~ m < n
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
gcd.div_ge_1 : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> forall n : nat, p <= n -> 1 <= gcd.div n p
le_lt_eq_dec : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> {n < m} + {n = m}
mult_le_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n * p <= m * q
plus_le_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n + p <= m + q
le_Sn_le : forall n m : nat, S n <= m -> n <= m
le_S_n : forall n m : nat, S n <= S m -> n <= m
Nat.div2_decr : forall a n : nat, a <= S n -> Nat.div2 a <= n
le_n_S : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> S n <= S m
Nat.le_succ_le_pred : forall n m : nat, S n <= m -> n <= Nat.pred m

intros.
intros H.
apply le_lt_trans with (m := n).
- assumption.
- apply lt_le_pred. assumption.
